message:
A CNN report that is widely circulated in Arab media:

The US promised Israel that it would give it full support in the event of an all-out war against Hezbollah.
event_breakdown:
A CNN report that is widely circulated in Arab media:
The CNN report, widely circulated in Arab media, said that the US promised Israel that it would give it full support in the event of an all-out war against Hezbollah.
